nodes.text: Whirl-Point-Six was a mercenary army associated with Waymancy Hollow. During the Waymancy Storm of 7811 BBY, Waymancy's religiously-motivated war against the Galactic Republic, its forces carried rapid-fire pulse-wave cannons that dramatically outclassed the weapons of the Republic Military, putting the Republic at an extreme disadvantage until it reverse-engineered Waymancy weapons and power generators captured at Sif-Alula.
